data.name: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor - The Bright Lord
data.detailed_description: Battle against Sauron as Celebrimbor, the great Elven Lord of the Second Age, to unlock powerful runes and the ability to wield the One Ring. If you own the Middle-earth™: Shadow of Mordor™ Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. Middle-earth™: Shadow of Mordor™ required; sold separately.
data.about_the_game: Battle against Sauron as Celebrimbor, the great Elven Lord of the Second Age, to unlock powerful runes and the ability to wield the One Ring. If you own the Middle-earth™: Shadow of Mordor™ Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. Middle-earth™: Shadow of Mordor™ required; sold separately.
data.short_description: Battle against Sauron as Celebrimbor, the great Elven Lord of the Second Age, to unlock powerful runes and the ability to wield the One Ring.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • İşletim Sistemi: 64-bit: Vista SP2, Win 7 SP1, Win 8.1
  • İşlemci: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Bellek: 3 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 | AMD Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Sürüm 11
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 25 GB kullanılabilir alan
pc_requirements.recommended:
Önerilen:
  • İşletim Sistemi: 64-bit: Win 7 SP1, Win 8.1
  • İşlemci: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz | AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz
  • Bellek: 8 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Sürüm 11
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 40 GB kullanılabilir alan

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Mac OS X 10.10.3
  • İşlemci: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5 or greater
  • Bellek: 8 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: 1GB Nvidia 650M, 2GB AMD R9 M290, 1.5GB Intel Iris Pro 5200 or better (See Notes for more details)
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 67 GB kullanılabilir alan
  • İlave Notlar: The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
    • * All 13” MacBook Pros released since Late 2016
    • * All 15” MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 21.5” iMacs released since Late 2013
    • * All 27” iMacs released since Late 2012
    • * All Mac Pros released since Late 2013
    Please note for your computer to meet the minimum requirements it must match or better all elements of the listed spec. For more detailed specifications check the Feral website.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Ubuntu 14.04.2 64-bit / SteamOS
  • İşlemci: 2.6 GHz
  • Bellek: 4 MB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: 1GB NVIDIA 640 or better with driver version 352.21 or later
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 47 MB kullanılabilir alan
  • İlave Notlar: AMD and Intel cards are NOT supported. If you wish to play the game using an AMD graphics card, you should update your graphics driver to version Catalyst 15.7 or higher. You should be able to run the game without experiencing stability issues or graphical glitches, but you may still experience poor performance.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Önerilen:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Ubuntu 14.04.2 64-bit / SteamOS
  • İşlemci: 3.4 GHz Intel
  • Bellek: 8 MB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: 4GB NVIDIA 9xx series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 47 MB kullanılabilir alan
